name: Hell's Revolt
description:
This game is based on the movement shooter genre, heavily inspired in games such as doom and ultrakill. Made for the game design component at Media Design School in about 3 weeks. 

Press F - Fullscreen.

Arrow Keys - Move between stages.

AD - Move your character.

Spacebar - Jump.

Left Click - Shoot.

Right Click - Grapple.

You play as a demon who has been cast down from heaven and publicly shamed for something which wasn't even your fault, as a demon you lay at wait for thousands of years until you were finally able to steal a sacred weapon from Satan himself which not even he could wield.
you promise to taint the weapon in God's holy blood and set forth to heaven, as angels and heaven dwellers try to stop you as you massacre them all to try achieve your one goal.

Thank you to Beatrix Kingsbury for some of the art assets.
